QuestData.Title: The Art of Flow
QuestData.Description: All done, $n! We have but one more step and Shal'Aran will have all the mana it needs.$b$bNow that I have better access to the ley line below I can break the pool so that it will flow through properly. Given the chaotic state of this ley line it will require all of my concentration to redirect the energy.$b$bI must warn you that we will attract attention while I am doing this. You will need to protect me while I complete the process.$b$bSpeak to me when you are ready.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Protect Arcanist Valtrois while she completes the ritual.
QuestData.LogDescription: Protect Arcanist Valtrois while she completes the ritual.
QuestData.RewardText: It is done. Shal'Aran will have no want of mana now.
